Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: The people on social media are abuzz about the upcoming Australian budget with one author promising a "responsible" and inflation-free cost-of-living relief that creates opportunities nationwide. They've also announced a $10 million investment in the PSMB demonstrating their commitment to disaster preparedness and first responder safety. Another post celebrates a pay raise for an over 85% female workforce in aged care and stresses the author's passion for women's equality in the coming budget. Meanwhile in the midst of political commentary and satirical comparisons to Jimonomics a simple table full of wisdom and advice reminds us of the diverse people at the heart of these policies.
